transcript: there's two ways that I've seen asks work in content there's an integrated approach and there's an intermittent approach an integrated approach would be like during the content I'm like hey if you want to learn more about this stuff got to $100 million leads it's a commercial of your own stuff the other way is intermittent intermittent is typically better for short form platforms so if you have 10 Instagram posts on the 11th one maybe you make one that's a little bit more about your credit repair services that you offer whatever it is and then you go right back to the pre-programmed show
